name: PolicyCheck
description: Seller policy risk intelligence for AI-powered commerce. Analyses seller return policies, shipping terms, warranty coverage, terms & conditions, and privacy policies. Returns structured risk data including risk level classifications, buyer protection scores (0-100), key findings, and factual summaries. Designed to be called by purchasing agents (ChatGPT, Claude, custom agents) to provide policy risk data for any merchant.

skills.name: Comprehensive Policy Analysis
skills.description: Full analysis of a seller's return, shipping, warranty, and terms policies. Accepts policy URLs or raw text. Returns overall risk score (low/medium/high/critical), buyer protection score (0-100), key findings in plain English, risk flags, and a factual summary. Provides risk data to inform purchase decisions.
examples: Analyse all policies for https://example-store.com before I purchase wireless earbuds for $79.99
Check the return and shipping policies at this URL: https://store.com/policies/refund-policy
What are the risks in these terms of service? [raw text]

skills.name: Quick Risk Check
skills.description: Auto-discovers and analyses policy pages from a seller's base URL. Crawls common policy paths (/policies/refund-policy, /policies/shipping-policy, /terms-of-service etc.) and returns a quick risk score. Best for fast pre-purchase screening when you only have the seller's homepage URL.
examples: Get risk data for this seller: https://example-shop.com

skills.name: Return Policy Analysis
skills.description: Focused analysis of a seller's return/refund policy. Extracts return window (days), restocking fees, who pays return shipping, exchange-only or store-credit restrictions, final sale items, and condition requirements.
examples: What's the return policy at https://store.com/policies/refund-policy
Analyse this return policy text for hidden restrictions

skills.name: Shipping Policy Analysis
skills.description: Focused analysis of a seller's shipping policy. Extracts free shipping thresholds, delivery timeframes, international availability, handling time, carriers, and tracking availability.
examples: How long does shipping take from this store?
Does this seller offer free shipping and tracking?

skills.name: Warranty Analysis
skills.description: Focused analysis of product or seller warranty. Extracts warranty duration, type (limited/full/lifetime/manufacturer), coverage details, exclusions, and claim process.
examples: What does the warranty cover for this product?
Are there any warranty exclusions I should know about?

skills.name: Terms & Conditions Analysis
skills.description: Legal risk analysis of terms and conditions. Checks for binding arbitration clauses, class action waivers, liability caps, termination rights, auto-renewal terms, governing law/jurisdiction, and data practices. Especially important for high-value purchases or ongoing subscriptions.
examples: Are there any legal red flags in these terms of service?
Does this company have binding arbitration or class action waivers?

skills.name: Signed Seller Assessment
skills.description: Generates a cryptographically signed seller policy assessment. Returns an Ed25519-signed envelope containing risk score, flags, and buyer protection data that agents can present as verifiable proof of seller policy analysis during checkout. Signatures can be independently verified via the JWKS endpoint.
examples: Get a signed seller assessment for https://amazon.com
Generate verifiable seller trust data for this merchant

security.name: X-API-Key
security.description: API key for authenticated access. Free tier: 100 requests/minute. Contact api@policycheck.tools for higher limits.
